text: @GregAbbott_TX Yet a Dallas woman sits in a COVID19 infected jail for opening her hair salon 3 days early. A travesty!  Another woman was arrested by the SWAT team in her TX county for opening her bar.  Surely that's cant be happening in Texas #Freedom
